item.description:
Watch the waning full moon rise over the ocean as we hike along the beach! Then have dinner and drinks...

The eastern horizon will be pitch black, hiding the crashing ocean waves. Then, slowly rising out of the depths of the dark sea, the brilliant moon will appear!

With a clear sky, it should be a magnificent sight!

Meet at 5:45 pm.

PARK AT: Petey's Summertime Restaurant and we'll meet at the beach access across the street. 

MOON RISES PROMPTLY AT 6PM!

Afterward, we'll eat and drink at Petey's!

Bring a headlamp/ flashlight but keep it turned off as much as possible.

If there's snow or ice, we'll probably need microspikes rather than snowshoes. And who knows, after we have a few drinks we may even howl at the moon...

Beaver Moon - November's full Moon was called the Beaver Moon because it was the time to set traps, before the waters froze over. This Moon was also called the Full Frost Moon. Moonrise 6pm.

Liability Release

AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and his heirs, and all members and participants of the Seacoast Outdoors Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. Kayaking, camping, hiking, bicycling, snow sports, alcohol consumption, and other activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.

Time and location are subject to change due to weather and other factors.  Always check email & this listing for updates before leaving home.
item.name: Beaver-Moon Beach Walk!
